title: Beautiful One Bedroom Apartment with Large Balcony located in DTLA
posting_body: Medici is the premier resort apartment community gracing the dynamic new downtown Los Angeles skyline.
The twelve unique floor plans assure you will find the right home to fit your lifestyle.
The Medici is the best choice for upscale living in Los Angeles.
-Frost-Free, Double Door Refrigerator with Ice Maker
-Rich European-Style Maple Wood Kitchen Cabinets with Melamine Interiors
-Putting Green and Pitching and Sand Traps
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
